content: I’m 60+ and about a year ago I saw a ‘tutorial’ about the size of the continents — you would have thought ‘I’ had discovered the world! I had no idea of the relative size of the continents to one another. I said about USA, “we’re so little!” Understanding the size of USA and being presented with actual ‘measures’ of comparison, gave me a truly ‘mind blowing’ new piece of information. It changes everything — for instance, migrations of people, and wars. MAPS! they need a little more respect, eh?
